articles.author: Dylan Scott
articles.title: US Covid vaccine rates dropped. Now Joe Biden is imposing mandates for federal workers. - Vox.com
articles.description: How most of Europe caught up to — and then surpassed — the US in their Covid-19 vaccine drives.
articles.content: Five months ago, the US was outpacing almost every country, except Israel, in vaccinating its people against Covid-19. Nearly one in five Americans were already fully vaccinated; Hungary stood out as… [+11381 chars]
